name: Daily Hardness Report
query:
SELECT
    TO_CHAR(heat_date, 'DD-MM-YYYY') "Heat Date",
    customer_name "Customer Name",
    part_name "Part Name",
    heat_no "Heat No",
    grade "Grade",
    bhn "BHN",
    reading_11 "Reading 1",
    reading_12 "Reading 2",
    reading_13 "Reading 3",
    reading_14 "Reading 4",
    reading_15 "Reading 5",
    master_specification "Master Specification",
    actual_hardness "Actual Hardness",
    checked_by "Checked By",
    prepared_by "Prepared By"
FROM
    `tabDaily Hardness`
